title: eTaSL robot configuration
description: Configuration to setup the robot kinematic model and robot driver

robotsimulators.title: RobotSimulators
robotsimulators.description: A RobotSimulator interfaces simulated robot hardware with eTaSL and runs in a separate thread (one per each RobotSimulator), communicating via shared memory (lock-free and wait-free) with the eTaSL thread for reduced latency.

robotdrivers.title: Robotdrivers
robotdrivers.description: A Robotdriver interfaces robot hardware with eTaSL and runs in a separate thread (one per Robotdriver), communicating via shared memory (lock-free and wait-free) with the eTaSL thread for reduced latency

default_robot_specification.title: default_robot_specification
default_robot_specification.description: Robot specification that describes the kinematics, jointnames, relevant frames and others
